SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
ApplicationHandler
This class stores and enacts the main methods the application uses.
CHOICEFileFilter
A custom file filter for CHOICE files.
ConnectionTriangle
A shape that represents the link from one page to another.
CreatePageFrame
Frame used to create new nodes/pages.
DragAndDrop
A panel that allows visual representations of nodes to be placed, dragged, and dropped where the user wishes.
EditorWindow
The main window of the program.
ExportGame
This program exports the user's inputs into individual HTML pages, connected by hyperlinks.
ExportWindow
Window used for changing settings before exporting the finished game.
ImageFileFilter
File filter for accepted images.
Link
This is an object for storage of links between nodes.
LinkPanel
Panel used to create and manage links between nodes.
Node
Represents a user-created passage.
NodeRectangle
This is a visual representation of the Node class, used for the visual editor.
PageEditorData
This class is meant to hold the data from the page editor popup in a central location for easy access.
PageEditorFrame
Frame used to edit nodes' data.
PageEditorPanel
Contains the individual elements used to edit the data of the node.
ProjectFile
This is intended to hold all of the data used in a project.
StartMenuWindow
This is the first window the user will see upon startup.
